citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4:00 pm on
06-Aug-18.
Gate closed. Called cell phone and left message. Waited 30 minutes.
